name: Cthulhu Sacrifice
description:
You are the henchman of Cthulhu!

Don't let Cthulhu get hungry or challenge its power.Sacrifice people to Cthulhu and help the Sirens find treasures.

Control:

WASD - movement

 Space - up

C - down

 Q - target lock 

LMB - throw harpoon

 F - [hold]shark's instinct 

Shift - charge

версия с исправленными багами (теперь доступна история) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1FGdA1L8Rs74GU-1zbHpVBtxYNJqUxswS/view?usp=sharing
